product_name: CygoLite Metro 550 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Featuring new Enhanced Cycling Optics, the Metro 550 features a powerful 550-lumen oval spread, offering extra-wide illumination and throw for enhanced visibility on lowlight rides.
short_description: Featuring new Enhanced Cycling Optics, the Metro 550 features a powerful 550-lumen oval spread, offering extra-wide illumination and throw for enhanced visibility on lowlight rides.
